items.title: Chartist Talks: These two stocks that can brighten your portfolio according to SBI Securities' Sudeep Shah
items.description: Currently, all three major US indices are trading below their short and long-term moving averages. These averages are in falling mode, which is a bearish sign, said Sudeep Shah.

items.title: Stock market holiday today: BSE, NSE to remain shut for Holi
items.description: Trading on the NSE and the BSE will resume on March 17 (Monday).
